alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 9:22PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Wind and Snow through Tuesday will lead to hazardous travel conditions... Gusty southerly winds continue Monday night into Tuesday morning ahead of a strong cold front. A band of snow will push east across the region through Tuesday afternoon. Snow could be moderate to heavy at times. Snow is expected to taper off west to east later this afternoon and evening. Snow amounts in the lower elevation will generally be around 2 to 5 inches, while mountains will likely see 4 to 8+ inches. Some areas of blowing and drifting snow are possible, which could result in hazardous travel conditions. Much colder Wednesday with high temps in the 20s to low 30s. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: Humboldt County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
